text: Rãnar da munafikai maza da munãfikai mãtã ke cẽwa waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni: "Ku dũbẽ mu, mu yi makãmashi daga haskenku!" A ce (musu): "Ku kõma a bãyanku, dõmin ku nẽmo wani haske." Sai a danne a tsakãninsu da wani gãru yanã da wani ƙyaure, a cikinsa nan rahama take, kuma a bãyansa daga wajensa azaba take.
